TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit KoreanCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 代表韓國曆法。

span.span: Represents the Korean calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 韓國曆法是一模一樣的西曆，不同之處在於年份和紀元會不同。The Korean calendar is exactly like the Gregorian calendar, except that the year and era are different. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關使用資訊類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱 < [ 使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 類別會辨識在目前的紀元。The class recognizes only the current era. 潤年，韓國曆法中對應至相同潤年西曆中。Leap years in the Korean calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為一個公曆年整除的四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除的公曆年是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 韓國曆法具有 12 個月 28 至 31 天每個：The Korean calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: |GetMonth 值GetMonth value|月份Month|一般年份中的天數Days in common years|閏年的天數Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|1 月 （一月）1월 (January)|3131|3131| |22|2 月 （二月）2월 (February)|2828|2929| |33|3 月 （三月）3월 (March)|3131|3131| |44|4 月 （四月）4월 (April)|3030|3030| |55|5월 (5)5월 (May)|3131|3131| |66|6월 （年 6 月）6월 (June)|3030|3030| |77|7월 （7 月）7월 (July)|3131|3131| |88|8 月 （8 月）8월 (August)|3131|3131| |99|9월 （年 9 月）9월 (September)|3030|3030| |1010|10 月 （十月）10월 (October)|3131|3131| |1111|11 月 （11 月）11월 (November)|3030|3030| |1212|12 月 （十二月）12월 (December)|3131|3131| 二月有 29 天期間潤年在年中常見的 28 天。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 days during common years. 日期年 1 月 1，2001 A.D.The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 西曆中就相當於目前紀元中韓國曆法 4334 年 1 月的第一天。in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the first day of January in the year 4334 of the current era in the Korean calendar. 每個物件支援一組的行事曆。Each object supports a set of calendars. 屬性傳回的文化特性的預設月曆，屬性會傳回陣列，包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，設定應用程式應該屬性到新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

span.span: Working with Calendars

public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);
override this.AddMonths : DateTime * int -> DateTime

span.span: The to which to add months.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 傳回與指定 相差指定月數的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: ，由將指定的月數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分產生的月份超出指定的年份會受到影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 10 月有 31 天，指定某一天，而且該月第 31 天的值`months`參數為 6，則產生的 year 是個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是年 4 月和產生的資料y 是第 30 天，也就是在 4 月的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值方面韓國曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Korean calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/koreancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CS/koreancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/VB/koreancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

is greater than 120000.

returns.span: ，由將指定的年數加入指定的 所產生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，二月有 28 天，除了有 29 天潤年期間。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 指定的日期是否在閏年中的 2 月 29 日，而`years`為 1，則產生的日期是在下一年度的 2 月的第 28 天。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值方面韓國曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Korean calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/koreancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CS/koreancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/VB/koreancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回指定之 中一年中的日期。

returns.span: 從 1 到 366 的整數，表示指定之 中的年份日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年中的日被指從當年第一日的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和，最後當月最後一天，請傳回該年份中的總天數。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 總計是相同的值傳回。The total is the same value as that returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示數個元件的值方面韓國曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Korean calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CPP/koreancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/CS/koreancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar_AddGet/VB/koreancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

span.span: A year.

summary.span: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 傳回值永遠都會是 0，因為 類別不支援閏月的概念。

span.span: The return value is always 0 because the class does not support the notion of a leap month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行事曆支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中的月之後，可能會發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 比方說，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示指定的日期與相關聯的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8，第八個月內，如呈獻第八個月的 9 和 10，第九個月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: A 1-based integer that represents the week of the year that includes the date in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來設定來判斷一年的週數`time`一年的最後一天的參數。This method can be used to determine the number of weeks in the year by setting the `time` parameter to the last day of the year. 包含特定文化特性值，可用於`rule`和`firstDayOfWeek`參數。 contains culture-specific values that can be used for the `rule` and `firstDayOfWeek` parameters. 的屬性包含預設值，表示特定文化特性，使用指定的行事曆週的第一天屬性。The property of contains the default value that represents the first day of the week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 的屬性包含預設定義日曆週的特定文化特性，使用指定曆法的值屬性。The property of contains the default value that defines a calendar week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 例如，在，的年 1 月 1，則傳回 1。For example, in , for January 1 returns 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何的結果取決於和用的值。The following code example shows how the result of varies depending on the and values used. 如果指定的日期是最後一天的年份，傳回該年份的週數總計。If the specified date is the last day of the year, returns the total number of weeks in that year. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CPP/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CS/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/VB/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.vb#1)]

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.name: month

An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 判斷指定紀元中指定的日期是否為閏日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期為閏日，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 潤年，韓國曆法中對應至相同潤年西曆中。Leap years in the Korean calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為一個公曆年整除的四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除的公曆年是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 例如，年 2 月 29 日是唯一的閏日。For example, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫最後一天的每個紀元中的五年的第二個月 （二月）。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/koreancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/koreancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/koreancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 潤年，韓國曆法中對應至相同潤年西曆中。Leap years in the Korean calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為一個公曆年整除的四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除的公曆年是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 閏月是一整個月，只會發生在為閏年。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 韓國曆法並沒有任何閏月。The Korean calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫目前紀元中的五年的所有月份。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CPP/koreancalendar_isleapmonth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CS/koreancalendar_isleapmonth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.KoreanCalendar.IsLeapMonth/VB/koreancalendar_isleapmonth.vb#1)]

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以表示的 100 年範圍中定義的最後一年。 defines the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by . 世紀取決於尋找兩位數年份，該 100 年範圍內的唯一相符項目。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit year within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 2029，100 年範圍為從 1930年 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，兩位數字 30 的值會解譯為 1930，而兩位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a two-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a two-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支援的兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 會導致方法將值轉換為四位數字值，根據值，表示適當的世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，此方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 應用程式提供四位數字值，超出支援的行事曆的範圍，則會提供為負數值，此方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許的 2 位數年份若要正確轉譯成 4 位數年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 比方說，西曆，如果這個屬性設定為 2029 之間，100 年範圍是從 1930年 2029年。For example, in the Gregorian calendar, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 這個屬性的初始值被衍生自 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，這項資訊可以變更的存留期間。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定 中的變更會自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 應用程式應該將這個值表示純粹 2 位數字年份 99。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 比方說，如果這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值小於 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值大於 。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在設定作業中，目前執行個體是唯讀的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
